title: Need 3 Members for a 5v5 ranked tournamet in an hour!
body: Hey Drakana here looking for 3 Gold 1 or lower to join me in some tournament 5v5 games hit me up in league send rank and position! thanks :D

replies.body: added, still need one? main top can't adc
I added you. Please check out my [op.gg](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=LV+1+Articuno)
